properties.address: Depot Cinema, Lewes, East Sussex BN7 2JS
properties.description: Refurbished space screening independent & foreign films, with a café, courtyard & art gallery. We have a large heated gallery area, with free WiFi and seating. Upon arrival please ask mention at the bar that you have seen this listing, and we can provide you with a free hot drink. Subject to availability and change.
properties.title: Depot Cinema and Restaurant

properties.address: St. Elizabeths Church, East Sussex BN20 8QX
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 3rd November 2023** Friday with Friends is an open space for all in the community. Tea / coffee and a chat, a nice hot Sausage Roll (Vegan available). On alternate weeks we will have skill sharing opportunities, we already have Baking, preserve making and circus skills booked.
properties.title: Friday with Friends

properties.address: St Peter's Church and Community Centre, Eastbourne, East Sussex BN22 9BY
properties.description: A coffee morning open to all. Under 18s must be accompanied by an adult.
properties.title: Friendship Group

properties.description: Free Coffee, tea and biscuits, comfy sofas, books to read and games to play.
properties.title: Gateway Christian Church

properties.address: High Street, East Sussex, East Sussex BN27 1AU

properties.address: St Mary's Church Hall, Eastbourne, East Sussex BN22 6PP
properties.description: A community coffee morning where anyone can come, find support and know that they don't have to feel alone. It's for everyone of all ages, genders, with children and without. Everyone is welcome. Under 18s must be accompanied by an adult. Volunteers with a range of personal experiences are on hand to help and can be the stepping stone to finding professional help. Thursday's, 10am-12pm.
properties.title: Let's Get Together

properties.address: Church Hill, Newhaven, East sussex BN9 9NA
properties.description: A warm and friendly greeting meets you at Newhaven Baptist. You can enjoy our refreshments and make yourself toast.
properties.title: Newhaven Baptist Church

properties.address: Lewes Rd, Ringmer, East Sussex BN8 5QH
properties.description: A warm and friendly space, with access to hot drinks and biscuits, internet access, friendly company, wifi and books! The extra Friday opening will start on 4th November and run until the end of March.
properties.title: Ringmer Village Library

properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 31st October 2024** Warm welcoming space open to everyone. Open all year long.
